hero.title: Chamber of Independent Entrepreneurs
hero.subtitle: Banja Luka
hero.description: Support and protection of entrepreneurs' interests in Republika Srpska

about.title: A Tradition of More Than 100 Years
about.description1: The Regional Chamber of Independent Entrepreneurs Banja Luka is an independent, professional, non-governmental and non-profit organization that unites independent entrepreneurs from 15 cities and municipalities in the Banja Luka region.
about.description2: Our chamber provides comprehensive support to entrepreneurs through education, consulting and protection of their business interests. With a tradition dating back to 1909, we continue to be a pillar of support for the entrepreneurial community.
about.description3: As part of the European network of entrepreneurs, we actively participate in international projects and EU programs. Contact us for information about current projects and cooperation opportunities.

history.title: Since 1909
history.description: More than 115 years of tradition and support for entrepreneurs

hero.title: Automatic Membership for All Entrepreneurs
hero.description: By registering your independent business in the Banja Luka region, you automatically become a member of our chamber with all benefits

automatic.title: Simple Membership Process
automatic.description: Chamber membership is automatic and begins the moment you register your independent business with the relevant authority

step1.title: Register Your Business
step1.description: Submit a request to register your independent business at the Registration Agency

step2.title: Automatic Enrollment
step2.description: The agency automatically registers your business with our chamber

step3.title: Receive Membership
step3.description: You become a full member with access to all services and benefits

infoBox.title: Important Note
infoBox.description: Membership is mandatory for all independent entrepreneurs operating in our region (15 cities and municipalities). The membership fee is paid once a year and covers all services and benefits provided by the chamber.

benefits.title: What You Get as a Member
benefits.description: As a member of our chamber, you have access to a wide range of services and benefits that will help you grow your business

legal.title: Legal Protection

process.title: How to Register Your Business
process.description: A guide through the process of registering an independent business and automatically acquiring chamber membership

step1.title: Prepare Documentation
step1.details: ID card, unique citizen number (JMBG), birth certificate extract, and proof of residential address

step2.title: Submit Application
step2.details: You can submit a registration request in person at the Registration Agency or electronically via e-Register. You need to define the activity you will perform

step3.title: Wait for Approval
step3.details: The Registration Agency processes your request (usually 1-3 business days). After approval, you are automatically registered with our chamber

step4.title: Membership Activation
step4.details: We contact you via email and phone with membership details, membership card, and instructions for using all benefits

cta.title: Have questions about the process?
cta.description: Our team is here to help you with every step of registration and explain all membership details

faq.title: Questions & Answers
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about chamber membership

item1.question: Is membership mandatory?
item1.answer: Yes, membership in the Chamber of Independent Entrepreneurs is mandatory for all independent entrepreneurs operating in the 15 municipalities of the Banja Luka region, in accordance with the Law on Chambers of Republika Srpska.

item2.question: How much is the annual membership fee?
item2.answer: The annual membership fee is determined based on your business's income level. You can find out the exact amount by contacting our office or via email. The fee covers all basic chamber services.

item3.question: When does my membership begin?
item3.answer: Your membership begins automatically on the date of registration of your independent business at the Registration Agency. You will receive a membership notification via email or mail within 7 days.

item4.question: What services are included in the membership fee?
item4.answer: The membership fee covers: legal consultations, representation before institutions, issuing basic certificates and confirmations, access to education (with discount), networking events, and business information.

item5.question: Can I cancel my membership?
item5.answer: Membership automatically ends when you close or transfer your independent business outside our region. For questions about membership termination, contact our administrative service.

item6.question: How can I use membership benefits?
item6.answer: After becoming a member, you will receive access to the online member portal where you can schedule consultations, register for education, and request document issuance. You can also contact us by phone or email.
